tool_description: provides API for regulatory calculations like Fed Tax calculations, state Tax, state withholdings
name: regAPIs
title: regAPIs

api_list.name: Fed standard deduction calculation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://regapis.p.rapidapi.com/regs/getcalc/Fed/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "regapis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
